pageDescription: A stylish portfolio site built with React and TypeScript.

project.des1: An interactive, responsive landing page with a live countdown timer, typewriter animation, email subscription form, and component-based front-end architecture. Ideal for product launches or personal brands.
project.tech2: React • TypeScript • JavaScript • CSS • i18n • React Helmet
project.des2: A stylish portfolio site showcasing model-inspired cat portraits, featuring bilingual navigation (English/French), smooth scrolling, image hover zoom, lazy loading, and a fully responsive layout for optimal performance and user experience.
project.tech3: React • TypeScript • JavaScript • CSS • i18n • React Helmet • Modal
project.des3: A modern, fully responsive portfolio site featuring bilingual support (English/French), smooth scroll navigation, SEO-friendly metadata and advanced portfolio modal with swipe/keyboard support. Highlights both photography and frontend expertise.

about.title: About Me
about.text1: Self-taught front-end developer with a background in photography and interior design.
about.text2: Passionate about creating websites that combine technical expertise with a sense of design.
